description: McKay-Thompson series of class 10B for the Monster group with a(0) = 0.
comments: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) (see A121373), phi(q) (A000122), psi(q) (A010054), chi(q) (A000700).
links: D. Ford, J. McKay and S. P. Norton, More on replicable functions, Commun. Algebra 22, No. 13, 5175-5193 (1994).
M. Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
Index entries for McKay-Thompson series for Monster simple group
formula: Expansion of q^-1 * (chi(-q) * chi(-q^5))^4 + 4 in powers of q where chi() is a Ramanujan theta function.Expansion of (eta(q) * eta(q^5) / (eta(q^2) * eta(q^10)))^4 + 4 in powers of q.G.f.: (Product_{k>0} (1 + x^k) * (1 + x^(5*k)))^-4 + 4.a(n) = A132040(n) unless n = 0. a(n) = -(-1)^n * A112158(n). - _Michael Somos_, Feb 02 2012
mathematica: QP = QPochhammer; s = (QP[q]*(QP[q^5]/QP[q^2]/QP[q^10]))^4 + 4*q + O[q]^40; CoefficientList[s, q] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 13 2015, adapted from PARI *)
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<-1, 0, n++; A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( (eta(x + A) * eta(x^5 + A) / eta(x^2 + A) / eta(x^10 + A))^4 + 4 * x, n))} /* _Michael Somos_, Feb 02 2012 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 27 2000
